wikipedia_page.main: Jonathan Morgan, (born 12 November 1974) is a Welsh Conservative politician, who served as a Conservative Assembly Member (AM) for South Wales Central from 1999 to 2007 and AM for Cardiff North from 2007 to 2011. In the National Assembly elections in 2011 he was beaten by Labour's candidate Julie Morgan, wife of former First Minister Rhodri Morgan.

response: The group has been critical of the Welsh government's response to the COVID-19 pandemic, with MacKinnon arguing that the government response was made under pressure and has led to great economic damage. Welsh Conservative politician Jonathan Morgan has written a piece for the Centre's website regarding the "new normal" as a result of the pandemic.
